participant_1.background:
I lost everything when the economy crashed.
I enjoy wearing comfortable, casual clothing that lets me move freely while I play music and write stories.
i recently moved to florida.
i really enjoy hiking.
I am not married, but I love planning weddings.

participant_2.background:
I love nature and my rose garden is one of my favorite places to be.
I once went on a road trip with Oscar and we saw a lot of cool places.
i am the youngest of 3.
Before I was a mom in telecommunications, I was a sniper in the army.
My biggest fear is not being able to perform my best on stage.

content.text: What is your favorite place in nature?
I love my rose garden. It is full of beautiful flowers and I love the smell.
That sounds amazing. I love hiking and being outdoors. I recently moved to Florida and I am loving all the beautiful nature here.
That is great! I have always wanted to go to Florida. What do you like most about it?
I love the beaches, the weather, and the people. Everyone is so friendly.
I have heard great things about the beaches in Florida. I would love to go swimming there.
You should definitely go! The water is beautiful and the weather is perfect.
Maybe I will take a vacation there soon.
That would be great! You would love it here.
Thank you! I am sure I would.
I am glad we are having this conversation. I love talking about nature and travel.
Me too! It is so much fun to meet new people and learn about different places.
I agree! I am glad we met.
